SEARCH
Package io.github.jspinak.brobot.actions.customActions

Class CommonActions

java.lang.Object
io.github.jspinak.brobot.actions.customActions.CommonActions
@Component public class CommonActions extends Object
It is useful to create one or more CommonActions classes for your applications in order to reduce code redundancy and make your code more readable. This class contains examples of potential methods for a CommonActions class.
